#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	long long int a1,b1,c1,d1,ans,a[106][109],mod=10000007,n,f,i,x,c,a2,b2,c2,d2;
	a[1][1]=1;
	a[1][2]=2;
	a[1][3]=1;
	a[1][4]=0;
	for(i=2;i<60;i++)
	{
		a1=a[i-1][1];
		b1=a[i-1][2];
		c1=a[i-1][3];
		d1=a[i-1][4];
		a[i][1]=(a1*a1+b1*c1)%mod;
		a[i][2]=(a1*b1+b1*d1)%mod;
		a[i][3]=(c1*a1+d1*c1)%mod;
		a[i][4]=(c1*b1+d1*d1)%mod;
	}
	scanf("%lld",&f);
	while(f--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		if(n==1)
		printf("1\n");
		else if(n==2)
		printf("5\n");
		else
		{
			n=n-2;
			a1=1;
			b1=0;
			c1=0;
			d1=1;
			while(n!=0)
			{
				x=1;
				c=0;
				while(1)
				{
					c++;
					if(x<=n && 2*x>n)
					break;
					x=x*2;
				}
				n=n-x;
				x=c;
				a2=(a1*a[x][1]+b1*a[x][3])%mod;
				b2=(a1*a[x][2]+b1*a[x][4])%mod;
				c2=(c1*a[x][1]+d1*a[x][3])%mod;
				d2=(c1*a[x][2]+d1*a[x][4])%mod;
				a1=a2;b1=b2;c1=c2;d1=d2;
				//printf("%lld\n%lld %lld %lld %lld\n",x,a1,b1,c1,d1);
			}
			ans=(a1*5+b1)%mod;
			printf("%lld\n",ans);
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
